thread.title_full: Meizu Pro 5 Coming to India in 2016 with Flyme 5.0 Out of the Box - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Meizu Pro 5 Coming to India in 2016 with Flyme 5.0 Out of the Box - newsR
text: A few days ago, Meizu released its latest Pro 5 flagship device, which, just like the Galaxy S6, comes equipped with an Exynos 7420 processor under the hood. While the producing company launched the phone in its own court, it has come to our attention that the handset will be made available in India too. The smartphone will be available in China in October, but the Flyme OS 5.0 update will arrive on November 15. As for the Indian market, Â»
